comment: Smart Data Models - SmartDataModels / Attribute adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.SmartDataModels/master/Attribute/schema.json
description: Description of the data model Attribute

contents.name: _id
contents.comment: Identifier of the item given from mongodb by default

contents.name: dataModel
contents.comment: The data model this attribute belongs to

contents.name: dataType
contents.comment: Json schema basic data type, boolean, integer, number, string, object or array

contents.name: format
contents.comment: Either date, or time, or date-time, or URI, etc the format of the attribute according to the definitions in json schema

contents.name: license
contents.comment: Link to the license for the data model

contents.name: model
contents.comment: Optional descriptor pointing to the semantic source of the attribute

contents.name: parentContext
contents.comment: Id of the parent attribute of the current one if it has any

contents.name: parentId
contents.comment: Identifier of the parent attribute of the current one if it has any

contents.name: repoName
contents.comment: The subject this attribute belongs to

contents.name: typeNGSI
contents.comment: Whether it is a Property, GeoProperty, or Relationship according to the NGSI standard. Other types could be as well

contents.name: units
contents.comment: Optional descriptor with the units. Preferably in UNECE format

contents.name: subpropertiesContext
contents.comment: Id of the subattributes of the current one if it has any
